title: ScanTech AI Systems Stock Set to Reverse Split on Tuesday, December 16th (NASDAQ:STAI)
description: ScanTech AI Systems Inc. (NASDAQ:STAI – Free Report) shares are going to reverse split before the market opens on Tuesday, December 16th. The 1-20 reverse split was announced on Friday, December 12th. The number of shares owned by shareholders will be adjusted after the market closes on Monday, December 15th.
